front.title: SRv6 NET-PGM extension: Compressed BSID Insertion

abstract.t: The End.B6.Insert and End.B6.Insert.Red SHOULD support the NEXT-C-SID flavor either individually or in combinations. This document defines the SRH processing of the End.B6.Insert and End.B6.Insert.Red with NEXT-C-SID flavor.
